summary: This report—the first in a series—looks at how 4 agencies implemented telework and how it affected their operations, performance, and more during and after the COVID-19 pandemic. All the agencies implemented three of the four telework practices we looked for, such as establishing eligibility criteria to ensure teleworking employees are approved equitably. But some agencies haven't yet evaluated telework's effect on their ability to provide...
title: Federal Telework: Selected Agencies Need to Evaluate the Potential Effects on Agency Performance
